title: Decreasing demand and supply, effect on P and Q

content.question: Assume that the market for bottled water is in equilibrium. If both the supply of and the demand for bottled water decrease, what will be the effect on equilibrium price and quantity?

topic.text: 1.6: Market Equilibrium, Disequilibrium, and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
